system.description: You alter wind force in the area. You can make the wind blow in a certain direction or manner, increase or decrease its strength, or confine an area of calm. The wind can be light, moderate, strong, or severe. In a moderate wind, ranged attacks take -2; in strong, -4; in severe, impossible. Flying creatures must make Fly checks or be blown back or checked. A severe wind can knock down Large or smaller creatures, and can destroy flimsy structures.
